title: Technical Virtual Assistant (GHL)
job_overview:
We are seeking a highly skilled Technical Virtual Assistant with hands-on experience in GoHighLevel, WordPress development, and AI integration. This role will support both front-end and back-end technical work, helping fill existing gaps in automation, CRM optimisation, and platform setup.
This is ideal for someone who can collaborate closely with the core team (including Gians) and provide solutions across marketing automation, system workflows, and technical infrastructure.

Your responsibilities will include:
Managing and configuring GoHighLevel funnels, workflows, and automations
Customising and building websites and landing pages in WordPress
Implementing and testing AI tools and integrations within GoHighLevel to enhance automation
Troubleshooting front-end and back-end issues across both platforms
Supporting CRM cleanup, pipeline logic, custom triggers, and reporting setups
Collaborating with the team to identify technical gaps and propose scalable solutions
Ensuring a smooth user experience across all digital touchpoints

What we're looking for:
Proven experience with GoHighLevel platform (CRM, workflows, campaigns, etc.)
Strong understanding of WordPress development, including plugins and integrations
Background in setting up or integrating AI-powered tools (chatbots, email assistants, automation features, etc.)
Ability to work collaboratively and suggest practical improvements based on current tech stack limitations

This is a hands-on, solutions-focused role — perfect for someone with both a technical brain and a marketing-savvy mindset.


Perks:
Flexible working hours
One-year contract with job security
Performance-based rewards and bonuses
Supportive work environment with regular coaching and feedback
Opportunity to grow with the business
HMO coverage for 12 months

To Apply for the Job:
Change the subject line to:
“I Love Automation”

(Label this answer 1.)
Send the PUBLIC link of your resume and your video or audio intro

(Label this answer 2.)
Write 2–3 sentences explaining why you would like this position and why you believe you would be a good fit for the role.

(Label this answer 3.)
Briefly describe your experience with GoHighLevel, WordPress, and AI Integration, if applicable.

(Label this answer 4.)
Share any experience you have with managing and configuring GHL funnels, workflows, and automations.

(Label this answer 5.)

Make sure to follow all the steps above. Only applicants who follow instructions precisely will be considered.

If selected, you will be invited to a short Zoom interview (camera required).
